text: Question 2 Which of the following statements is/are INCORRECT about the OSPF (Open Shortest Path First) routing protocol used in the Internet? e OSPF implements Bellman-Ford algorithm to find shortest paths. OSPF uses Dijkstra's shortest path algorithm to implement least-cost path routing Q OSPF is used as an inter-domain routing protocol Q OSPF implements hierarchical routing. GATE CSE 2023 Computer Network
